Help Center

How to use it ?

as you see the “ i “ beside the navbar, thats the button to access this help center

use the filter button under the search bar to filter the medicine to their assign types

it obviously the icon showed what is for

every time u click the medicine the inventory section appear at the top of it with a list of your item and the total amount of your items

the “ DONE “ button will render a modal that is give u a downloadable png of your item and total amount

What is the Purpose ?

it depends on how you use it, but our main purpose is to give a user access and find what's the popular and effective medicine they need and able to know the price of it
